WorkItem.ClosedComment: We benchmark a bunch of different programs and haven't seen anything like this (0.9.7 perf numbers are very close or faster than 0.9.5). Can you post or link to a project so we can profile its compilation to understand what's going on? Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
The new version takes much longer to compile our code than 0.9.5.

I compiled our code 3 x with the new version and 3 x with the old version.

The results:

0.9.5:
28.41 seconds
28.76 seconds
27.64 seconds

0.9.7 (1.0RC):
39.92 seconds
40.13 seconds
38.76 seconds

We have 114 TypeScript files in our solution (2.199.426 bytes).

It would be nice if you could fix this for 1.0.


Regards,
Mathias

Comments.Message:
I don't know which of our 114 soruce files causes the slow down and I don't think that I have permission to send you the whole .ts source code of our application.

Is there anything else we can do to diangose the issue?
We have some perf improvements in the release-1.0.1 branch
